titleStmt.title: The confession of Edward Fitz-Harys, Esq. written with his own hand, and delivered to Dr. Hawkins, minister of the Tower, July 1, 1681, being the day of his execution : together with his last speech.
titleStmt.author: Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681.
